description: Learn the fundamentals of Machine Learning, algorithms, and applications in this comprehensive course designed for beginners.

steps.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
steps.objective: Understand the basics of machine learning and its importance in today's digital world.
content_outline: 1.2 History and Evolution of Machine Learning

steps.title: Mathematical Concepts for Machine Learning
steps.objective: Gain an understanding of essential mathematical concepts used in machine learning.

steps.title: Learning Algorithms
steps.objective: Explore various machine learning algorithms and their practical applications.

steps.title: Machine Learning Libraries and Frameworks
steps.objective: Get hands-on experience with popular machine learning libraries and frameworks.

steps.title: Evaluating and Improving Machine Learning Models
steps.objective: Learn how to evaluate machine learning models' performance and techniques for improving model accuracy.

steps.title: Machine Learning Projects
steps.objective: Develop practical skills by working on multiple machine learning projects.
